item.title: AAP Says Will Ask INDIA Bloc To Remove Congress From Alliance If... - NDTV
item.description:
AAP Threatens to Remove Congress from INDIA Alliance Over Ajay Maken Controversy

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

In a major setback for opposition unity, the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) has announced intentions to request Congress's removal from the INDIA alliance if it does not take action against its Delhi leader, Ajay Maken.

  • AAP accuses Congress of facilitating BJP's electoral success ahead of the Delhi Assembly elections.
  • Allegations arise that Ajay Maken's statements align with BJP's agenda.
  • The face-off follows previous cooperation between AAP and Congress during the Lok Sabha elections.
  • AAP demands action against Maken within 24 hours or will seek Congress's removal from the alliance.
“All limits have been crossed,” said MP Sanjay Singh regarding Maken’s comments.

This situation highlights growing tensions within the opposition, as AAP asserts its stance against Congress's perceived alignment with BJP interests.

“Bumrah’s spell was crucial for India to make a comeback.”

The first day of the 4th Test showcased intense competition, setting the stage for the upcoming days.

item.title: ICAI CA Final Result 2024 LIVE Updates: Did ICAI announce CA Final result releasing time? - The Indian Express
item.description:
ICAI CA Final Result 2024 LIVE Updates

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Indian Express

The ICAI CA Final results for November 2024 will be available on the official website icai.org. Candidates need to log in with their roll and registration numbers or pin numbers to access their results and the merit list.

  • The total number of candidates who appeared for ICAI CA Group 1 final exam in 2023 was 65,294.
  • Out of these, only 6,176 candidates passed, resulting in a pass percentage of 9.46%.
  • In Group 2, the total number of candidates was 62,679, with 13,540 passing, giving an overall pass percentage of 21.6%.

item.title: What did Sam Konstas say on the Virat Kohli shoulder-bump altercation? - The Times of India
item.description:
What did Sam Konstas say on the Virat Kohli shoulder-bump altercation?

Date: Thursday, December 28, 2024 | Source: Times of India

A physical altercation occurred between Virat Kohli and debutant Sam Konstas during the fourth Test match between Australia and India at the Melbourne Cricket Ground. The incident escalated following an aggressive run by Konstas, who scored 60 runs and had a shoulder-to-shoulder collision with Kohli.

  • Konstas faced off against India's top bowler Jasprit Bumrah and drew attention with his aggressive batting style.
  • The altercation began after a shoulder bump between Konstas and Kohli.
  • Usman Khawaja intervened to calm the heated exchange.
  • Ricky Ponting commented that Kohli instigated the confrontation.
  • Konstas later downplayed the incident, citing cricketing emotions.
“I think the emotions got to both of us. I didn't quite realise, I was doing my gloves, then a little shoulder charge, but it happens in cricket.” - Sam Konstas

Despite the tension, both teams are focusing on a vital five-match series that is currently tied at 1-1.

item.title: Vivo Y29 5G launches in India with military-grade durability: Price, specs - Business Standard
item.description:
Vivo Y29 5G Launches in India with Military-Grade Durability

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: Tech News

The Vivo Y29 5G smartphone has been launched in India, notable for being the first in its price range to acquire both SGS and military-grade certifications.

Key Points:

  • Price starts at Rs 15,499 for the 4GB RAM variant.
  • Military-grade and SGS certified for durability.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor.
  • Features a 5500mAh battery with 44W fast charging.
  • Available in three colors: Glacier Blue, Titanium Gold, and Diamond Black.
  • Offers bank cashback and installment plans for buyers.
“It is the first smartphone under the Rs 20,000 mark to get both SGS and military-grade certification for durability.”

The launch of the Vivo Y29 5G marks an important step in offering affordable yet durable smartphones in India.

item.title: 'No Compromise On Law And Order': Revanth Reddy To Telugu Film Body Amid Pushpa 2 Row - News18
item.description:
No Compromise On Law And Order: Revanth Reddy To Telugu Film Body Amid Pushpa 2 Row

Date: December 26, 2024 | Source: News18

The Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy met with representatives of the Telugu film industry regarding the recent stampede incident during the premier of 'Pushpa 2'. He emphasized that there will be no compromise concerning law and order in the state.

  • The meeting was attended by several prominent film producers and directors.
  • CM Reddy urged the film industry to promote investments and support the anti-drugs campaign.
  • The discussion followed a tragic stampede which resulted in a fatality.
  • BJP MP Anurag Thakur criticized attempts to undermine Telugu actors, citing their contributions to Indian cinema.
  • There are concerns regarding the Congress government's approach to the film industry, with allegations of targeting and extortion.
Something troubling is unfolding in Telangana under the Revanth Reddy-led Congress government. The administration appears to be targeting Tollywood... — Amit Malviya, December 25, 2024

The situation reflects broader issues of governance and transparency in the film industry, with calls for a safer and more supportive environment for filmmakers.

item.title: South Korea opposition says it will vote to impeach acting President Han - Reuters
item.description:
South Korea Opposition to Impeach Acting President Han Duck-soo

Date: December 26, 2024

Source: Reuters

The South Korean opposition party plans to vote on a bill to impeach acting President Han Duck-soo, citing his unqualified handling of the constitution amid a deepening political crisis.

  • Democratic Party to introduce impeachment bill on Thursday.
  • Han criticized for failure to appoint justices to the Constitutional Court.
  • First impeachment trial hearing for President Yoon scheduled for Friday.
"It has become clear that Prime Minister and acting President Han Duck-soo does not have the qualification or the will to safeguard the Constitution," said Democratic Party floor leader Park Chan-dae.

This impeachment move adds to the ongoing tensions in South Korean politics, particularly following the impeachment of President Yoon Suk Yeol over martial law declarations.

item.title: M.T. Vasudevan Nair bids adieu: Life, works, and honours - The Hindu
item.description:
M.T. Vasudevan Nair bids adieu: Life, works, and honours

Published on: December 26, 2024 | Source: The Hindu

M.T. Vasudevan Nair, a Jnanpith Award winner, known for elevating Malayalam storytelling, passed away on December 25, 2024, at the age of 91. He had been hospitalized due to heart failure and suffered from various health issues.

  • MT is celebrated for his profound storytelling and exploration of human emotions.
  • He made significant contributions to Malayalam literature and cinema.
  • His works reflect the complexities of rural life and culture.
“His storytelling explored human emotions and the complexities of rural life.”

His death marks the end of an era in Malayalam literature and cinema, leaving behind a rich legacy.

item.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 launching in India on January 10: Expected specifications - Business Standard
item.description:
Xiaomi Pad 7 Launching in India on January 10: Expected Specifications

Publication Date: Dec 26 2024 | Source: Business Standard

Xiaomi is set to launch the Xiaomi Pad 7 tablet in India on January 10. This next-generation tablet features advanced specifications and may come with dedicated accessories like a stylus pen and a folio keyboard.

  • Powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Plus Gen 3 chip
  • 11.2-inch LCD, 3200x2136 resolution, 144Hz refresh rate
  • Camera: 13MP rear, 8MP front
  • Battery capacity of 8850mAh with 45W fast charging
  • Runs Android 15-based HyperOS 2
  • Up to 12GB RAM and 256GB storage options
  • Supports HDR10 and Dolby Vision
"The Indian variant of the Xiaomi Pad 7 will likely feature specifications mirroring the Chinese counterpart with minor changes."

The launch of the Xiaomi Pad 7 is anticipated to attract significant attention due to its competitive features and performance enhancements.

item.title: India vs Australia LIVE Cricket Score, 4th Test Day 1: Jasprit Bumrah picks Mitchell Marsh, AUS 250/5 vs IND in Melbourne - The Indian Express
item.description:
India vs Australia LIVE Cricket Score, 4th Test Day 1: AUS 311/6 vs IND at Stumps in Melbourne

Date: December 26, 2024 | Source: Indian Express

On Day 1 of the 4th Test in Melbourne, Australia scored 311 runs for 6 wickets at stumps after opting to bat in hot conditions. Notable performances include debutant Sam Konstas, who scored 60 runs with an aggressive style.

  • Australia was placed at 176 for 2 at tea.
  • Sam Konstas made a strong debut with an opening stand of 89 runs.
  • Pat Cummins opted to bat first on a green-tinged pitch.
  • India made several changes, bringing in Washington Sundar to strengthen their bowling options.
“Konstas played three audacious reverse scoops over slips, hitting two fours and a six.”

The match is part of the ongoing series, currently tied at 1-1 after a draw in Brisbane.

item.title: IRCTC Website Down During Peak Tatkal Hours, Netizens Share Frustration On X - ABP Live
item.description:
IRCTC Website Down During Peak Tatkal Hours, Netizens Share Frustration On X

Date: 26 Dec 2024 | Source: ABP Live

The IRCTC online ticket-booking portal went down during peak tatkal hours, affecting users across major cities in India. As reported by Downdetector, approximately 2,500 users experienced issues around 10:25 AM IST.

  • Outage affected major cities including New Delhi, Mumbai, and Ahmedabad.
  • Reports of the outage peaked at around 10:25 AM IST on Downdetector.
  • IRCTC's website displayed a 'Downtime Message' indicating service unavailability due to maintenance.
  • Users took to social media platform X to express their frustrations regarding the outage.
  • IRCTC has not yet provided an official statement on the cause of the outage.
“The IRCTC website is down, causing a lot of trouble to book tickets and also my payment got stuck.” - Affected user

The widespread outage has drawn significant attention on social media, highlighting the ongoing issues users face with the IRCTC platform during high-demand periods.

item.description:

The Xiaomi Pad 7 is expected to launch in India on January 10, 2024, promising to offer advanced features and improved specifications.

  • Release date set for January 10, 2024.

"Xiaomi aims to deliver an experience that rivals top competitors with the Pad 7."

The upcoming Xiaomi Pad 7 is positioned to be a strong contender in the tablet market, especially with its launch in India attracting considerable attention from tech enthusiasts.

item.title: Gold outshines equities in 2024: A look at the drivers behind the divergence - Upstox
item.description:
Gold Outshines Equities in 2024: A Look at the Drivers Behind the Divergence

Publication Date: December 24, 2024 | Source: Upstox

The year 2024 has seen a stark difference in performance between gold and equities, with gold delivering 20.5% YTD returns while equities produced a modest 8.9% YTD. This article explores the reasons behind these diverging trends.

  • Gold's Safe-Haven Appeal: Gold acted as a refuge during market uncertainty, resulting in higher demand.
  • Economic Factors: Increased consumer demand, particularly in India and China, has supported gold prices.
  • Policy Support: Changes to long-term capital gains tax have made gold investments more attractive.
  • Equities Underperform: Equities faced challenges like earnings slowdowns and inflation issues.
  • Market Outlook: Future performance for both asset classes is influenced by economic and geopolitical factors.
“2024 was a year in which gold proved its worth, emerging as one of the top-performing assets amid uncertainty.”

In conclusion, despite gold's outperformance, there is a potential for equities to recover if economic conditions improve. Investors should remain vigilant and consider diversification in their portfolios as the market evolves.

item.title: Missing Squid Game 2 on Netflix? Check exact time of its release, plot and other details - India TV News
item.description:
Missing Squid Game 2 on Netflix? Check exact time of its release, plot and other details

Publication Date: December 26, 2024, Source: India TV News

Squid Game, a popular Korean series, is all set to premiere with its second season on Netflix on December 26, but fans were unable to find it available at midnight. Here are important details about the show's release.

Key Points:

  • Season 2 scheduled for Netflix on December 26, 2024.
  • Available at 3 am ET in the US and 12:30 pm IST in India.
  • Season 2 will have seven episodes, with the first titled 'Bread and Lottery'.
  • Returning cast includes Lee Jung-jae, Lee Byung-hun, Wi Ha-jun, and Gong Yoo, along with new actors Yim Si-wan, Kang Ha-neul, Park Gyu-young, and Choi Seung-hyun.
  • The plot follows Seong Gi-hun re-entering the game three years after his victory, this time to destroy the organization behind the game.

item.title: IRCTC Down? Passengers Unable To Book Tatkal Tickets Amid Massive Outage - Times Now
item.description:
IRCTC Experiences Major Outage, Leaving Passengers Unable to Book Tatkal Tickets

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Times Now

The IRCTC application and website experienced a significant outage on Thursday, preventing many passengers from booking tickets during peak hours.

  • The outage was reported widely on social media, with many users expressing frustration.
  • Downdetector indicated a spike in outage reports for the IRCTC platform.
  • This is the second major outage in December, following a previous maintenance issue on December 9.
  • Tatkal booking for AC classes starts at 10 AM and for non-AC classes at 11 AM, making the timing crucial for many travelers.
“India reached the moon, but the Indian Railways ticket booking app can't handle Tatkal booking without crashing. It's 2024, and a stable server shouldn't be rocket science!”

Passengers are calling for improvements and accountability from IRCTC regarding the recurring issues with the ticket booking system.

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: NDTV Sports

On the first day of the 4th Test between India and Australia, India faced a setback with a DRS (Decision Review System) blunder that left captain Rohit Sharma visibly frustrated as the game unfolded with live scores and updates.

  • The match features two top cricketing nations, India and Australia.
  • There was a notable DRS controversy affecting India’s performance.
  • Rohit Sharma expressed his frustration during the match.
“The DRS blunder was a significant moment in the match, showcasing the intense pressure on players during this high-stakes game.”

This match highlights the critical importance of technology in modern cricket and its impact on team morale and decisions made on the field.

item.title: Unimech Aerospace IPO: Check GMP as listing enters last day for bidding - India Today
item.description:
Unimech Aerospace IPO: Check GMP as listing enters last day for bidding

Published On: Dec 26, 2024

Source: India Today

The Unimech Aerospace IPO is closing for subscription today. The issue aims to raise Rs 500 crore through a combination of fresh shares and an offer for sale.

  • The IPO comprises 32 lakh shares valued at Rs 250 crore each.
  • The price band is set at Rs 745 to Rs 785 per share.
  • Minimum investment is Rs 14,915 for a lot of 19 shares.
  • The total subscription rate is 13.02 times as of December 26, with strong demand in the retail and non-institutional segments.
  • The grey market premium (GMP) is Rs 610, indicating potential opening price gains for investors.
"The estimated listing price is Rs 1,395 per share, suggesting a potential gain of 77.71% for investors."

The shares are expected to list on BSE and NSE on December 31, 2024.

item.title: Bird Strike Behind Azerbaijan Airlines Flight Crash? Here's What Russian Officials Say - News18
item.description:
Bird Strike Behind Azerbaijan Airlines Flight Crash? Here's What Russian Officials Say

Date: December 26, 2024   |   Source: News18

A preliminary investigation suggested that a potential bird strike might have contributed to the crash of an Azerbaijan Airlines passenger jet in western Kazakhstan, which left 35 out of 67 people on board feared dead.

  • The crash occurred near Aktau, Kazakhstan.
  • 32 people survived from flight J2-8243, which strayed from its scheduled route.
  • Russian aviation authorities indicated a bird collision may have caused the incident.
  • A report claims an oxygen tank exploded on board prior to the crash.
  • The flight, en route from Baku to Grozny, made an emergency landing attempt.
“A plane doing the Baku-Grozny route crashed near the city of Aktau. It belongs to Azerbaijan Airlines,” the Kazakh transport ministry stated.

The tragic incident has sparked an investigation by Kazakhstan and prompted national mourning in Azerbaijan.

item.title: Which infectious disease is likely to be biggest emerging problem in 2025 - The Week
item.description:
Which infectious disease is likely to be biggest emerging problem in 2025

Updated: December 26, 2024 | The Conversation

As COVID-19 recedes, health officials are increasingly worried about the potential rise of H5N1 bird flu in 2025, coupled with ongoing issues from malaria, HIV, and tuberculosis.

  • The top infectious disease threats include malaria, HIV, and tuberculosis, which together account for around 2 million deaths annually.
  • Bird flu (H5N1) is currently a major concern due to recent infections in cattle and the potential for transmission to humans.
  • 61 human cases of bird flu have been reported in the US in 2024, largely among farm workers.
  • The H5N1 virus has a high mortality rate of 30% in human cases but does not currently spread efficiently between people.
  • A mutation could allow H5N1 to adapt to humans, raising the risk of a pandemic.
  • Countries like the UK are preparing by purchasing vaccines against H5N1 in case of an outbreak.
  • Interconnected health approaches are emphasized to address both animal and human health risks.
"If this strain of bird flu makes that switch and can start transmitting between humans, governments must act quickly to control the spread."

The urgency in addressing bird flu stems from its potential to disrupt animal health and have economic ramifications, highlighting the importance of proactive measures in pandemic preparedness.

item.title: IND vs AUS Boxing Day Test: Virat Kohli and Sam Konstas spar on opening morning at MCG - The Hindu
item.description:
Kohli and Konstas Spar on MCG's Opening Morning of the Boxing Day Test

Date: December 26, 2024 | Source: The Hindu

Australia's rivalry with India escalated this morning as Virat Kohli and debutant Sam Konstas had a physical encounter during the fourth Test at the MCG.

  • Kohli and Konstas collided on the field, sparking a moment of tension.
  • Konstas scored 60 runs off 65 balls on his debut before falling to Ravindra Jadeja.
  • Former players Ricky Ponting and Michael Vaughan commented on the incident, suggesting Kohli instigated it.
  • As of lunch, Australia was at 112-1, with Khawaja unbeaten on 38.
  • The series stands at 1-1 after a rainy draw in Brisbane.
  • Significant implications for the World Test Championship Final race were noted, with Australia and India vying for qualification.
“Virat’s walked one whole pitch over to his right and instigated that.” - Ricky Ponting

The ongoing rivalry and competitive spirit between these two cricketing nations continues to offer thrilling drama on the field.

item.title: Luigi Mangione craze: CEO murder suspect's Nordstrom sweater sells out after courtroom appearance as 'fan - The Times of India
item.description:
Luigi Mangione craze: CEO murder suspect's Nordstrom sweater sells out after courtroom appearance as 'fans' rush to copy his look

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: The Times of India

Luigi Mangione, the suspect in a high-profile CEO murder case, has sparked a fashion trend with his courtroom attire as shoppers rush to replicate his look.

  • Following his recent court appearance, a Nordstrom sweater worn by Mangione quickly sold out.
  • The incident has captivated public attention, blending true crime and fashion.
  • Social media users have started sharing their takes on his style, creating a buzz around courtroom fashion.
“It’s fascinating how a courtroom can turn into a runway,” said one fashion analyst.

This unexpected blend of tragedy and style highlights the peculiar ways in which public fascination can drive trends.
